Song.title: We Are Not Ashamed
Song.copyright: © 2015 Sovereign Grace Worship Music & Words by Neil DeGraide, Doug Plank, and Eric McAllister

Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: The [F#m]news of Jesus Christ, the crucif[D/F#]ied [A]Risen, reigning at the Father’s [C#7/G#]side Is [F#m]foolishness to those who cannot [D/F#]see [A]Blinded by the lies they have bel[C#7/G#]ieved
PRE-CH: So, [F#m]let the Church arise,{,} [D/F#]let the anthem ring Till [A]all the world has heard{,} of Christ the [C#7/G#]Risen King The [F#m]song of the redeemed{,} [D/F#]boldly we shall sing The [A]hope of all the world{,} is Christ the [C#7/G#]Risen King!
CHORUS: [D]We, we are not a[A]shamed{,} for the [Bm]gospel is the power of God to [F#m]save [E] Yes, [D]we, we are not a[A]shamed{,} for we [Bm]have no other Savior to pro[F#m]claim [E] [D]Christ a[A/C#]lone, the [Bm]Life, the T[E/G#]ruth, the W[F#m]ay
TURN: [F#m | E/G# | A | B7 | F#m | E/G# | A | B7 | B7]
VERSE 2: The [F#m]enemies of God are in a r[D/F#]age Op[A/C#]posing Him, their efforts are in [C#7/E#]vain Through [F#m]every age the gospel will en[D]dure The [A/C#]Spirit’s with the Church forever[C#7/G#]more [(to pre-chorus)]
LAST CH: [D]We, we are not a[A]shamed{,} for we [Bm]have a sure foundation in His [F#m]grace [E] Yes, [D]we, we are not a[A]shamed For we [Bm]have a great salvation in His [F#m]name [E] [D]Christ a[A/C#]lone, the [Bm]Life, the T[E/G#]ruth, the W[F#m]ay
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 the news of jesus christ the crucified risen reigning at the fathers side is foolishness to those who cannot see blinded by the lies they have believed prech so let the church arise let the anthem ring till all the world has heard of christ the risen king the song of the redeemed boldly we shall sing the hope of all the world is christ the risen king chorus we we are not ashamed for the gospel is the power of god to save yes we we are not ashamed for we have no other savior to proclaim christ alone the life the truth the way turn verse 2 the enemies of god are in a rage opposing him their efforts are in vain through every age the gospel will endure the spirits with the church forevermore last ch we we are not ashamed for we have a sure foundation in his grace yes we we are not ashamed for we have a great salvation in his name christ alone the life the truth the way
